title: 10 Minute Beginner Full Body Stretch
description:
10 Minute Beginner Full Body Stretch

Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/physicaltherapyvideo
Website: https://bobandbrad.com/
Bob and Brad Amazon Store: https://amzn.to/3jAM0JN

This video is part of a series called, Workout with Jordan. For this video you may want a chair or surface to hold onto. Join Jordan today for a quick 10 minute full body strech for beginners.

To access a playlist of Jordan's workouts click here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8l32k1r15l68gTmjJM-nRvbZqgRT1oDX 
Music: L8KQGASBUCAVWNSK

Some of our astute followers have noticed me slurring my words. I am not drunk but working with Brad it would be justifiable. I had 6 infected cysts removed from my mouth (noncancerous) and I have residual scar tissue and numbness. I will try to do better. Thanks Bob.

This Week's Giveaway:
This week we are giving away a Bob and Brad Neck Massager!

Giveaway Link: www.bobandbrad.com/giveaways 
Purchase Link: https://amzn.to/3IOKD7d 
Discount code: There is a $5 off coupon on Amazon for a limited time! 

This giveaway is open to our US fans only! 

Our videos offer the best "get fit , stay healthy, and pain-free" information directed toward people 0 to 101 years old. Physical Therapists Bob Schrupp and Brad Heineck have over 50 years of combined experience. We try to add a twist of our humor into each video in our quest to be the "Most Famous Physical Therapists on the Internet" In our opinion of course!!! Subscribe to us now and join the fun. Not only will these videos provide outstanding health information on treating yourself at home, we also do product reviews. channelDescription:
Introducing the dynamic trio—Bob Schrupp, Brad Heineck, and the newest addition, Mike—the "Most Famous Physical Therapists on the Internet"! With a combined experience of over 60 years in the physical therapy field, these seasoned experts bring you the best advice, tips, and information on how to get fit, stay healthy, and live pain-free—from the comfort of your home.
While Bob may no longer be on the screen, he continues to share his expertise from behind the scenes, and now, Mike joins the on-screen action. Our videos cover a wide range of topics suitable for everyone, from age 0 to 101. Whether you're looking for self-treatment techniques or simply seeking health-related insights, Brad, Bob, and Mike have you covered.
With a twist of humor in each video, we aim to make your health journey enjoyable. Don't miss out on the fun—subscribe to our channel and join us in the pursuit of a healthy, fit, pain-free life!

As  Amazon Associates, we earn from qualifying purchase

comments: Everyone says basic and start doing gymnastics but you have lived up to my expectation of keeping it simple.Thank You so much.
I will do this daily until it’s too easy. Thank you 👍🏽👍🏽
Amazing video! Exactly what I was looking for! Simple and effective! I feel great!
Thank you. I appreciate your genuineness, keeping it simple and real without unnecessary chatter. 👍🏼
I've been living with disabilities for the last 13 years, these exercises really do help me, I feel more energized.  Thanks for the helpful exercises 😊
